title: Medford man arrested twice in one day, allegedly hit tow lot workers with impounded car
author: Darin Zullo

title: Boston animal shelter receives $2M donation for facility construction
author: Darin Zullo
bullets: Local News The Animal Rescue League of Boston’s new facility has been under construction since the spring and is expected to be completed in 2026.
The Animal Rescue League of Boston received a $2 million donation to fund construction of its new three-story facility in the South End.

Animal Rescue League of Boston By Darin Zullo November 16, 2025 | 10:23 AM 1 minute to read A Boston animal shelter organization has received the largest single gift in its history for a new facility, according to the Boston Business Journal.

title: Person shot on Beacon Hill, hospitalized with life-threatening injuries
author: Darin Zullo
bullets: Crime The shooting victim has not yet been identified but was taken to a hospital with life-threatening injuries Friday, police said.
By Darin Zullo November 16, 2025 | 9:24 AM Less than a minute to read ShareSend this article to your social connections.
A person has been hospitalized with life-threatening injuries after they were shot Friday morning on Beacon Hill, according to Boston police.

title: Bill Belichick was reportedly never in consideration to become Giants’ next head coach
author: Conor Roche
bullets: New England Patriots Belichick removed himself from consideration for all NFL head coaching gigs on Friday.
Bill Belichick is in the midst of his first season as North Carolina's head coach.
